creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
As the subject says; the download page [1] should have a prominent link to the current KEYS file.

There are two places where I think this could be added:

After:
"verify the integrity of the files using the signatures and checksums available from this page. "

As a link in:
"First download the KEYS file"

The page also does not have any obvious links with the text 'signature'.
Perhaps the text 'signed' could be replaced with 'signature (.asc)' - that would also tie in with the verification description.


BTW, there is a minor typo:

"To insure that you have downloaded"
should be
"To ensure that you have downloaded"

[1] http://poi.apache.org/download.html

Thanks for the suggestion!

Applied in r1751168. The site will need to be republished before these changes are visible on the website.
creator: onealj@apache.org

text: Fixed the 3.14 for "signed" -> "signature (.asc)" as well in r1751556 and r1751559.
creator: onealj@apache.org
